content.verbatim_text: The controller shall, both at the time of the determination of the means for processing and at the time of the processing itself, implement appropriate technical and organisational measures, such as pseudonymisation, which are designed to implement data-protection principles in an effective manner and to integrate the necessary safeguards into the processing.
content.title: Data protection by design and by default

structured_data.relevance_to_odgs: Architecture-level governance — requires data quality controls to be embedded by design, not bolted on

interpretation.summary: GDPR Art. 25: Data protection by design and by default
interpretation.applicability: All organizations processing personal data of EU residents
